mapper.sql: t.id as id, t.person_id as personId, t.custom_id as customId, t.custom_name as customName, t.id_card as idCard,t.gender as gender, t.telephone as telephone, t.type as type, t.days as days,t.service_num as serviceNum， t.next_date as nextDate, t.love_status as loveStatus, t.status as status, t.created as created, t.updated as updated
